### Outreach & Community Partnerships

We are so happy you have chosen Modesto Junior College to pursue your academic and personal growth, and hope you will take advantage of the many programs and services our area provides for students. Modesto Junior College is a college rich in history and tradition and is part of the fabric of our community. We are a Hispanic Serving Institution with a Hispanic student population of 52%. The Outreach & Community Partnerships Team is committed to connecting our community with Modesto Junior College. We are here throughout the year to assist potential students, community organizations, and businesses to learn about the educational opportunities and services available at Modesto Junior College.

### Outreach & Community Partnerships Mission Statement  

The mission of the Office of Outreach & Community Partnerships Department is to ensure access to any person preparing to attend Modesto Junior College through assistance and navigation of the collegeâ€™s processes. Through community outreach even...
